Sharing your Assignment 3 Questions and Answers

  • To: Multiple recipients of list <ics1c@UCI.EDU>
  • Subject: Sharing your Assignment 3 Questions and Answers
  • From: ICS 1C Instructional Staff <ics1c@ics.uci.edu>
  • Date: Mon, 13 Feb 1995 17:48:41 -0800 
As announced in class today, Monday 13 February, the questions
and answers you submit as part of Assignment 3 will be made
network available to others in the class.  
If you DO NOT want your submission made available in this fashion,
send a message to that effect to ics1c@ics.uci.edu by 8 a.m.
Wednesday, 15 February, or by the time you submit your HTML
document (whichever comes first).

-- sdf
Stephen Franklin
ICS 1C Instructor
  • Prev: Quiz 3, Friday Feb 24
  • Next: ICS 1C Mailing List Archives
  • Index: Mail Index
